observation: SQC – Malaysia ISO Consultant  (603) 7955 2633 info@sqc.com.my About Us Our Story What Makes Us Different True North Our Credentials HQ & Branches Services Consultation Services ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management Systems ISO 14001:2015 Environmental Management Systems ISO 22000:2018 Food Safety Management Systems, HACCP, GMP ISO 45001:2018 Occupational Health & Safety Management Systems ISO/IEC 17025:2017 Testing and Calibration Laboratories ISO 37001:2016 Anti-Bribery Management Systems IATF 16949:2016 Automotive Quality Management Systems AS 9100 Aerospace Quality Management Systems British Retail Consortium Global Standard (BRC) HALAL Consultancy GMP Plus ISO 15189:2012 Medical Laboratories – Requirements for Quality and Competence ISO 13485:2016 Medical Devices Quality Management Systems ISO/IEC 27001:2013 Information Security Management Systems Integrated Management Systems Malaysia Sustainable Palm Oil (MSPO) Good Distribution Practice for Medical Devices (GDPMD) Second-Party Audits Compliance Consulting Services Introduction of Blue Ocean Strategy Blue Ocean Strategy® Workshop Blue Ocean Strategy® Coaching Program Training In-House Training Programme Public Training Calendar Latest News Road Traffic Safety Management System Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) ISO/IEC 17025:2017 Testimonials Contact Us Who we are SQC Group of Companies (SQC) stands at the forefront of quality management and management system consultation, training, research and development in the region. Proven Experience Professional services We are an Expert in this Field Established in 1995, SQC is well recognized and acknowledged Established in 1995, SQC is well recognized and acknowledged as a pioneer in providing consultation and training services in quality management systems and business management programmes in the region with an impressive and comprehensive network of our subsidiary companies. READ OUR STORY Services We Provide SQC provides consultancy, research, training and technical support services in the field of Quality Management and improvement in order to enhance product and service quality, competitive edge as well as reducing the cost attributed to poor quality. Training Programme Why choose us? Defined by Our People We take a consistent approach to recruiting and skills development so that we can quickly deliver the right team, with the right experience and expertise, to every client. Our consultants include medical doctors, engineers, business managers, civil servants, entrepreneurs, and research scientists. They join SQC Consulting Group for the opportunity to apply their talents to complex, important challenges. Practical Approach and Enduring Results Our clients’ needs are constantly changing, so we continually seek new and better ways to serve them. To do this, we are bringing new talent into the firm, associate with local universities and developing new capabilities. We serve clients at every level of their organization, whether as a trusted advisor to top management or as a hands-on coach for front line employees. Blending practical activities, group discussions and classroom learning to put recommendations into practice, to help develop workforce skills and drive operational for continuous improvement. We work with our clients to build the capabilities that enable organizations to achieve sustainable advantage. Continuous Support: Clients Come First Providing continuous support to our customers is one of SQC’s core value. We take pride in providing continuous customer service after successful certification through quality and professionalism. We measure our success by our clients’ success. Call us now for supports! Value for Money We are committed to creating value for our clients that returns many multiples of their investment. We deliver tangible and positive change, not simply reports. We set our standard for value creation extremely high. Our people are passionate about creating bottom-line results for clients. We hold ourselves accountable to our value delivered standards by engaging candidly within SQC and with clients about the level of value created by our joint efforts. Consultation Our Partners Some of Our Clients SQC Group of Companies (SQC) Read More > Quick Links Our Services Get In Touch Unit No. B508, Pusat Dagangan Phileo Damansara II, 15 Jalan 16/11, Off Jalan Damansara, 46350 Petaling Jaya, Selangor Darul Ehsan, Malaysia. Phone: +(603)-7955 2633 Fax: +(603)-7954 1833 SQC Management Sdn Bhd

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain has been registered since 1998 and is set to expire in 2028, which suggests a long-standing presence and commitment. The registrant organization is SQC Management Sdn Bhd, which aligns with the company information provided on the website. The domain status is "ok", and there's no evidence of recent changes that could be considered suspicious. However, the contact information is redacted for privacy, which is not unusual for legitimate businesses. There's no immediate red flag from the WHOIS data, but I should investigate further to verify the legitimacy of the company and its operations.

observation.reason: The website does not exhibit the characteristics of a scam site. It has a long-standing domain registration legitimate business services related to ISO certifications and management consultation and an online presence with profiles and reviews on established platforms. No evidence of scam activities such as unusually low prices unrealistic money claims targeting of psychological weaknesses non-existent company information inappropriate contact details ambiguous privacy policies unusual payment methods or outdated information was found.
